Heirs Life What is life Insurance? Life insurance is an agreement you make with an insurance company to pay your chosen beneficiary a lump sum of money if the unexpected happens to you. This ensures your family's financial stability. Why do I need life insurance? Life insurance can help pay off debts, replace lost income, and lets those dear to you to carry on with life without hardship. Having a life insurance plan also gives total peace of mind knowing that the needs of your loved

text: family's financial stability. Why do I need life insurance? Life insurance can help pay off debts, replace lost income, and lets those dear to you to carry on with life without hardship. Having a life insurance plan also gives total peace of mind knowing that the needs of your loved ones are well provided for, whether you are here or not. Heirs General Insurance is only obligated to repair what was damaged in the accident. Any other additional repairs or replacements will come at an additional cost to you. What types of life insurance policies are available? There are various life insurance plans for every stage of your life. There are savings plans, core protection plans/core life insurance, and endowment/inheritance plans. Examples include MyHeirs, Term Assure, and Whole Life plans respectively. Each type has its own features, benefits, and premium structures. Chat with our advisors to know that best plans for you. How do I choose the right life insurance policy? Consider factors such as your budget, coverage needs, financial goals, and risk tolerance. If you need assistance, you can email or chat with a member of our customer service team for expert advice. text: for you. How do I choose the right life insurance policy? Consider factors such as your budget, coverage needs, financial goals, and risk tolerance. If you need assistance, you can email or chat with a member of our customer service team for expert advice. Can I change my life insurance policy after purchasing it? Depending on the policy type, you may have the option to adjust your coverage amounts or change beneficiaries. Contact us for specific details. What determines my premium? Premiums (the cost of life insurance) are based on factors such as age, gender, health, lifestyle, occupation, and coverage amount. What is the process for filing a life insurance claim? To file a claim, simply initiate the process by filling the form on the Claims section of our website. We will review and process the claim accordingly. Can I purchase life insurance for someone else? Absolutely! You can purchase a life insurance plan for someone else with their consent (e.g., spouse, child, or business partner). text: a life insurance plan for someone else with their consent (e.g., spouse, child, or business partner). What happens if I outlive my life insurance policy? This depends on the nature of the policy. For insurance-backed savings plans, your full benefits will be paid to you but for term life policy (done annually), your coverage will expire, and no benefits will be paid out. You may renew the policy or convert it into a whole life plan. What if I miss a premium payment? This may result in a lapse or cancellation of your policy, depending on the grace period outlined in your policy contract. It is advisable to pay your premiums as and when due. Heirs Brokers What is an insurance brokerage company? An insurance brokerage company acts as an intermediary between clients and insurance companies, helping clients find suitable insurance policies that meet their needs and budget. Why should I use an insurance brokerage company? Insurance brokers have access to multiple insurance carriers and can offer independent advice and personalised service to help you find the best coverage options at competitive prices. text: I use an insurance brokerage company? Insurance brokers have access to multiple insurance carriers and can offer independent advice and personalised service to help you find the best coverage options at competitive prices. How does an insurance brokerage company differ from an insurance agent? Unlike insurance agents who typically represent one insurance company, insurance brokers work with multiple insurers, providing clients with a wider range of options and unbiased advice. What types of insurance can I purchase through Heirs Insurance Brokers (HIB)? HIB offers a variety of insurance products, including but not limited to life insurance, health insurance, property insurance (homeowners, renters, and commercial property), auto insurance, business insurance, and other specialty lines. How does Heirs Insurance Brokers determine the best insurance options for clients? We assess clients' needs, analyse risks, and compare policies from different insurance companies to recommend coverage options tailored to clients' specific requirements and budget. Do you charge for this service? We get paid through commissions from the insurer for policies sold to them. Clients generally do not pay additional fees for the services provided by insurance brokers. How do I file a claim through HIB? Simply contact us and we will guide you through the

Simply contact us and we will guide you through the claims process and liaise with the insurance company on your behalf to ensure a smooth resolution What should I consider when choosing an insurance brokerage company? Consider factors such as the brokerage's expertise, range of insurance products, level of customer service, reputation, and accessibility when selecting an insurance brokerage company to work with. Are insurance brokerage companies regulated? Yes. We are regulated by the Nigerian Council of Registered Insurance Brokers (NCRIB). How do I get started with Heirs Insurance Brokers? To get started, simply contact us via [email protected] and an expert advisor will reach out to help. Heirs General What is general insurance? General insurance, also known as non-life insurance, provides financial protection against unexpected risks and events around your properties, cars, businesses, travel, and health. It provides peace of mind by helping you recover from unforeseen circumstances if they happen, ensuring you don’t spend your hard earned money.

text: What is general insurance? General insurance, also known as non-life insurance, provides financial protection against unexpected risks and events around your properties, cars, businesses, travel, and health. It provides peace of mind by helping you recover from unforeseen circumstances if they happen, ensuring you don’t spend your hard earned money. What types of insurance do you offer? These include but are not limited to property insurance (e.g., homeowners, tenants, and commercial property insurance), car insurance (Her motor, Comprehensive, Third-party), business insurance (goods-in-transit, fire, shop, etc), travel insurance, and basic health emergencies like Personal Accident insurance. Speak to us to get an insurance plan that suits you. How do you determine the premiums (cost of insurance)? The premiums you pay depends on factors like the type of insurance coverage selected, your risk profile, coverage amount, claims history, and location. Can I customize my insurance coverage to fit my needs? Yes, you can. Simply reach out to us and we can arrange a tailored insurance package for your unique needs.
